text:
-3-
January 19 - Former program director with large educational radio station
wants management or program director position in ETV. 5 years experience
programming for commercial stations, as well. Presently with the U.S.
Information Agency in Pakistan, but position terminates end of this
month. Male, 34, married, B.A. Location open. $7500.
January 20 - University director of radio-TV, experienced teacher-prod¬
ucer wants a position in educational broadcasting as program director,
or producer. Wants to teach. 4 years professional theater and radio
work, 5 years teaching and producing. Male, 41, PhD., married.
Location, salary, open.
January 21 - Production assistant and writer in commercial TV with 12
years experience in radio wants same type position in educational broad¬
casting. Woman, 33, A.B., single. Location open. $75/wk.
January 22 - Young man, 27, single, with commercial and educational
experience in radio-TV and movies desires change to express himself in
ETV. Now commercially employed as film manager and producer. Loca¬
tion, salary, open.
January 23 - Young woman, 23, M.S. in Communications with 1 year dir¬
ecting and producing experience at educational station, wants position
as program assistant, assistant director or producer in ETV. B.S. in
Home Ec. Location open. $3500.
January 24 - PhD., male, 51, married, director of education and research
last 10 years for leading midwest station. Also taught 15 years various
university music courses. Wants position in ETV in administration,
research or programming. Location, salary, open.
January 25 - Production manager of large midwest educational station -
AM & FM operation, college teaching experience, radio workship super¬
vision . Interested in management of smaller educational radio station
with good facilities. Male, 32, M.S*, married. Location open. $5500.
January 26 - Producer-coordinator, area chairman in radio-TV, 15 years
commercial experience, 6 years college-level teaching, 3 years director
of ETV workshop, much experience producing ETV programs. Male, 43,
PhD., married. Looking for a challenge. Location open. $6000.
